ing: 1 (4.25 ounce) can chopped black olives, drained
1 teaspoon garlic powder, or to taste
4 (2 ounce) packages thinly sliced deli beef (such as Carl BuddigÂ®)
des: "Easy appetizer sure to please. Few ingredients, cheap to buy."
ins: Mix cream cheese, olives, and garlic powder in a bowl. Spoon 1 tablespoon cream cheese mixture into the middle of each beef slice; fold beef slice over filling to create a pillow. Secure the edges with a dot of cream cheese mixture.
